question:
Recently, National e-Assessment Schemes was inaugurated. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. NeAC is accountable to finance ministry.
  2. One of its regional centres is located in Lucknow.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: NeAC will be an autonomous office. It will enforce the work of e-Assessment scheme to eliminate the interface between the assessing officer and the tax payer. 58,322 income tax cases were selected under the National e-Assessment Centre. NeAC is located in Delhi. It would be headed by Principal Chief Commissioner of Income Tax. Statement 2 is incorrect:                                                            There are 8 regional e-Assessment Centres. They are located in Delhi, Mumbai, Chennai, Ahmedabad, Kolkata, Pune, Bengaluru and Hyderabad. Each of these centres is headed by Chief Commissioner of the Income Tax. The cases for the desired work shall be assigned by the NeAC to different units through automated allocation systems.
